org.goobi.production.flow.statistics.hibernate

Interface IEvaluableFilter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataSource, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDefinedFilter, UserDefinedStepFilter, UserProcessesFilter, UserProjectFilter, UserTemplatesFilter

    public interface IEvaluableFilter
extends IDataSource
    This interface defines a filter, which can be used in the goobi/hibernate context. It may be implemented serializable so it could be saved and loaded. It manages the creation and building of a criteria according to the users or programmers input, holding the result.
    Author:
    Wulf Riebensahm
